List of CPU architectures

  • 1970 — CTC Datapoint 2200 Version I
  • 1972 — CTC Datapoint 2200 Version II
  • 1972 — Intel 8008
  • 1974 — Intel 8080
  • 1976 — Intel 8085, Tundra CA80C85B
  • 1976 — Zilog Z80
  • 1978 — Intel 8086
  • 1979 — Zilog Z8000
  • 1982 — NEC V20 8080 Emulation Mode
  • 1985 — Hitach HD64180, Zilog Z180
  • 1985 — Zilog Z800, 1987 — Zilog Z280
  • 1987 — NEC µPD9002
  • 1989 — Sharp SM83 (LR35902)
  • 1989 — KR580VM1 (КР580ВМ1)
  • 1990 — ASCII R800
  • 1994 — Zilog Z380
  • 1999 — Rabbit 2000
  • 2001 — Zilog eZ80
  • 2002 — Rabbit 3000
  • 2006 — Rabbit 4000, 2008 — Rabbit 5000
  • 2010 — Rabbit 6000
  • 2017 — SpecNext Ltd. Z80N
